description: Customer support scenario with support agents and customers

emails.subject: Product not working
emails.body:
Hello,

I purchased your product last week but it's not working properly. The screen keeps freezing.

Can you please help?

Ticket ID: #12345

John

emails.subject: Re: Product not working [Ticket #12345]
emails.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the issue.

Could you please try the following steps:
1. Restart the device
2. Update to the latest firmware
3. Clear the cache

Let me know if this helps!

Best regards,
Sarah
Support Team

emails.subject: Re: Product not working [Ticket #12345]
emails.body:
Hi Sarah,

I tried all the steps but the problem persists. What should I do next?

John

emails.subject: Question about pricing

Jane

emails.subject: Re: Question about pricing
emails.body:

Mike

emails.subject: Re: Product not working [Ticket #12345]
emails.body:
Hi John,

I'm escalating your case to our technical team. They will contact you within 24 hours with a solution.

We apologize for the inconvenience.

Sarah
